Text:
comment 1 - posting anything as "anonymous" makes your torrent suspicious at best. People like to be able to se a history of reliable uploads. ie; only a total noob or a complete idiot would download from an anonymous source.

comment 2 - your mod belongs over at Fallout New Vegas Nexus or some other dedicated mod site. That way it can be evaluated and compared to other mods as well as tested for durability. No-ones perfect - especially with any Fallout mods, considering how buggy the games are in the first place. Good Luck.

@Testiklees  if it is actually a mod .esp/.esm mod plugin file so 220kb is not too odd.  What is odd though is that I couldn't find this mod on NVNexus...  Why would someone make a mod and chose to make a torrent and put it on TPB instead of putting it on a dedicated NV mod site...  I smell something fishy.

Messed up first sentence last time...  gonna try again


@Testiklees: if it is actually a mod it would be a .esp/.esm mod plugin file so 220kb wouldn't be too odd. What is odd though is that I couldn't find this mod on NVNexus... Why would someone make a mod and chose to make a torrent and put it on TPB instead of putting it on a dedicated NV mod site... I smell something fishy.
There is nothing fishy about it, and it is available at NVNexus.
